did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Division of Biological Sciences.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Lectures in various topics related to biology and society, including the biology of man, man's diseases, agriculture, technology, economics, medicine, vision and perception, and computers.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Lectures in various topics related to biology and society, including the biology of man, man's diseases, agriculture, technology, economics, medicine, vision and perception, and computers.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University. Division of Biological Sciences. "Biology and Society" Lecture Series, #53-2-1312.
